text:
Hey !! How are you doing lately ?? I'm glad to hear the show is nearly done !! If you can't continue with this company, do you have any idea where you're gonna apply or what you wanna do ????


Thanks for the tip regarding forbidden planet btw ! I went and found some awesome books that gave me a lot of inspiration, they really have some amazing books for very good prices !! 

How are you finding zbrush ?? How did you start learning it ?? 

Well concerning my nuke project, we've actually finished but the brief was to use a scene and add/remove elements and basically create a photorealistic scene ! It went alright and it was quite interesting however it wasn't really my cup of tea >_< p
And thanks for sending over the next gen announcement ! It could be quite interesting and i'll defo look into it !!
